description: DOOM is a classic first-person shooter game developed by id Software. This container provides a ready-to-run version of the original DOOM game.
Discord is a VoIP, instant messaging, and digital distribution platform designed for creating communities. It provides voice calls, video calls, text messaging, and file sharing.
Parsec is a proprietary desktop capture application primarily used for gaming. It allows users to stream and play games remotely.
Ubuntu Focal Deluxe is an enhanced version of Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, providing extra tools and optimizations for development and deployment.
Core Ubuntu Focal is a minimalistic version of Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, optimized for use as a base image in containers.
